definition: to miss narrowly/to let a great opportunity slip
to issue a call for action/to raise one's hand and issue a rousing call (idiom)
lit. to have three heads and six arms (idiom)/fig. to possess remarkable abilities/a being of formidable powers
lever arm (i.e. perpendicular distance from the fulcrum to the line of force)
a mantis trying to stop a chariot (idiom)/to overrate oneself and attempt sth impossible/also written 螳臂擋車|螳臂挡车[tang2 bi4 dang3 che1]

sentences.english: Remove the upper suspension arm nut and bolt at the axle bracket.
sentences.chinese: 從車軸支架上拆去上端懸吊臂螺帽和螺栓。

sentences.english: But Hendrawan is excellent at playing overhead stokes and underarm strokes.
sentences.chinese: 葉誠萬的頭頂擊球和臂下擊球都是絕好的。

sentences.english: Back-burner arm of the need for specialized design.
sentences.chinese: 回面燃燒臂結構需要進行專門的設計。

sentences.english: Full 360 degree rotation available with knuckle boom connection.
sentences.chinese: 轉向節臂連接器，可360度旋轉。

sentences.english: Artifacts with different degrees occurred on C-arm CT in all patients.
sentences.chinese: 所有患者C臂CT圖像均有不同程度僞影。

sentences.english: Standing at the back of the crowd, we wrapped our arms around each other, swaying to the music.
sentences.chinese: 我們站在人羣的後面，臂挽着臂，隨着樂曲擺動着。

sentences.english: Standing at the back of the crowd, we wrapped our arms around each other, swaying to the music.
sentences.chinese: 我們站在人羣的後面，臂挽着臂，隨着樂曲擺動着。

sentences.english: Some rye chromosome arms were observed more frequently than the others in translocations.
sentences.chinese: 不同的黑麥染色體臂參與易位的頻率不同。

sentences.english: They walked along the beach arm in arm.
sentences.chinese: 他們臂挽臂沿着海灘散步。

sentences.english: Finally, simulation results of a planar 3R redundant manipulator are given.
sentences.chinese: 最後用平面3R冗餘度機械臂進行了計算仿真。

sentences.english: The term tiller is also used for the steering arm of small outboard engines.
sentences.chinese: tiller這個術語也用來指舷外發動機的掌舵臂。

sentences.english: The most common injury is brachial plexus palsy, often caused by shoulder dystocia.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的產傷是臂麻痹，通常因肩難產引起。

sentences.english: She and her boyfriend walked arm in arm.
sentences.chinese: 她和她的男朋友臂挽臂地走着。

sentences.english: If they stray into our barley field, I take them up in my arms.
sentences.chinese: 它們若走進我的麥地，我就把它們抱在臂裏。

sentences.english: Affix using one of the crank arm fixing bolts.
sentences.chinese: 詞綴使用其中的一個曲柄臂固定螺栓。

definition: the five fingers of one's hand
pincers/pliers/tongs/claw (of animal)/to grasp with pincers/to pinch/to clamp/to restrain/to restrict/to gag
